extendedInfo.description: Police Scanner and RadioPolice Scanner and Radio is the best police scanner or police radio out there because it is FREE but gives you all of the same features and quality as the paid radio apps. Police Scanner and Radio lets you listen in on live emergency (firefighter and police), military (marine) and transportation (airplanes and railroads) conversations taking place over the radio waves. Scan what's being said so you can be the first to learn breaking news in your area. (Please note it is legal to listen to, but not interfere with, police feeds for entertainment purposes only.)Features:-	Listen to the police radio (similar to a police scanner)-	Choose from one of the 3500 Police Scanner Radio options that come with this app-	Listen to police feeds in the background (you can use other apps or visit websites while you listen to the transmissions) -	Choose from any police radios around you with our nearby feature (we even tell you how far you are away from the radio station)-	Choose from the Top100 feeds-	Or search the country, state, county or city to find the feed you would like to tune into-	The app also comes with a police code language dictionary so you know whatâs going on the police radio that you are listening toHow does a police radio scanner work? (answer from Wikipedia)A scanner is a radio receiver that can automatically tune, or scan, two or more discrete frequencies, stopping when it finds a signal on one of them and then continuing to scan other frequencies when the initial transmission ceases.We have put all of this in an app for you so it is easy to listen to the police radio, for everyone. Is it legal?In most countries, including the USA, it is legal to listen to the police radio or to use a police scanner. However, it is NOT legal to use this app to aid in a crime or interfere with police activity. Is the radio real?Yes, all of the police streams that you can listen to in the police scanner radio are real. They are played in real-time. What stations are supported?We support radios from all around the world including:All 50 US State Police RadiosCanadian Police RadioAustralian Police ScannerChilean Police Radio Italian Police RadioUK Police ScannerGerman Police RadioSwiss Police RadioDutch Police ScannerSwedish Police RadioVenezuelan Police ScannerNZ Police RadioBrazilian Police RadioSpanish Police ScannerBelgium Police RadioSlovenian Police ScannerTop 10 Police Scanners:1.	Chicago Police Radio Scanner2.	LAPD â Los Angeles Police Department Police Radio3.	Waterloo (Canada) Regional Police 4.	NYPD â New York Police Department Special Operations Division Police Radio5.	San Diego Police Dispatch 6.	Ingham County Public Safety Radio7.	Pictou County Public Safety 8.	San Juan and Once Police, Fire and EMS Radio Station9.	Houston Police Radio Scanner10.	Metropolitan Regional Fire Department RadioSample of Police Codes:Code 2 Urgent - no light or sirenCode 3 Use lights and sirenCode 4 No further assistance neededCode 5 StakeoutCode 6 Stay out of areaCode 7 Meal breakCode 8 Restroom breakCode 9 Summer uniformCode 10 SWAT pre-call upCode 11 SWAT Call upCode 37 Subject/Property wanted Code Blue Bus/Cab in troubleCode Red Varda Alarm activatedCode Purple Gang Activity Medical / Fire Status Codes...Code 10 Critical Trauma caseCode 20 Acute Trauma caseCode 30 Trauma caseCode 40 Serious case (IV started)Code 50 Basic transport (not serious)Code N Newsworthy event 5150 Mental case10851 Auto theft10852 Tampering with vehicle20001 Hit and run - Felony20002 Hit and run - Misdemeanor20007 Hit and run - Unattended21958 Drunk pedestrian on roadway22350 Speeding22500 Illegal parking23101 Drunk driving - injuries23102 Drunk driving23103 Reckless driver23104 Reckless driver23105 Driver under narcotics23109 Racing23110 Person throwing objects atvehicles23151 Drunk driving - injuries23152 Drunk driver

reviews.title: It\'s alright
reviews.comment: It\'s alright app. I just don\'t like when I have to keep turning it on. I would rate it a 5 star if it would stay on and quit cutting off on me but otherwise it\'s alright.
reviews.author: Crystal Mayhew

reviews.title: Needs more feeds
reviews.comment: I would like to give this app 5star but I cannot get any feeds to work in Montana and there\'s not any feeds for my area of silverbow county/Butte Montana. It works great for other cities and I would recommend it for those in states with larger cities.
reviews.author: Elizabeth O\'Neil

reviews.title: Awesome! Best available.
reviews.comment: Easy to use. Truly the best that I have used and downloaded and I\'ve tried them all.
reviews.author: kelly clark

reviews.title: Channels
reviews.comment: It want pick up every county in south Carolina like greenwood. And laurens add them and I might rember download this app. Other wise worse app ever
reviews.author: Robert Holmes

reviews.title: Not good thus far
reviews.comment: There is major police activity in my current location. It didn\'t work at time of download and still is not. Shows stopped streaming.
reviews.author: Sunny Quane

reviews.title: This app totally rocks!
reviews.comment: I have both an iPod Touch and an Android phone, and I have the Police Scanner on both. I prefer listening to a sscanner than even the news because most of the time by the time the news is broadcast, the event is old. But I share this app with all of my friends. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Diane Fisher

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works great on my phone.  Helped keep me away from accident congestion the day I installed app.  Connects quickly just about anywhere.
reviews.author: Dorma Hughes

reviews.title: wtf queensland is default
reviews.comment: wtf! i only have denver, co saved as favorite. when i minimize to taskbar and drop back down it ALWAYS changes to queensland australia! i never even looked at that station need not say obviously it is NOT selected as a favorite! junk, uninstalling!
reviews.author: Brent Stansbury

reviews.comment: DO NOT INSTALL. IT\'S INVASIVE AND DEFECTIVE. ALL IT DOES IS STEAL YOUR LOCATION AND BUFFER CONSTANTLY. DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP PLEASE!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Best app sometime it stop steaming or crashes but it great app
reviews.author: Daniel Porter

reviews.title: r u serious??
reviews.comment: Pitiful, just plain flat out pitiful. U cant tell what channel ur on, or keep it on a channel. It scans both police & EMS. No one wants to hear the EMS cut in when ur listening to a police situation. Then to top it off, this thing stops scanning & u have to keep pressing play. Come on, maaan!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for Denver & Aurora CO
reviews.comment: Very reliable for Denver and Aurora information... not sure about other areas yet, but  based on D & A it will probably work just as good!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good times
reviews.comment: Fun to listen to late at night and hear what goes on in my county. No problems with the buffering so it comes in nice and clear
reviews.author: Brad Hise

reviews.title: Best Free
reviews.comment: Of all the police scanners apps that are free that i have tried this one has turned out to be the best one i\'ve found so far
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Having the Police code list  is super convenient to look up what\'s being said. Good job!
reviews.author: Ian Frank

reviews.title: Good app!
reviews.comment: This is a good app. It doesn\'t have to keep buffering like most scanner apps do. It has almost any police and fire dept you can think of. The only thing i would like to see improved is to add a flashing led light when the app is running and the screen is locked. Otherwise.....Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Droid Incredible 2-Don\'t work
reviews.comment: After 10 minutes waiting constantly hitting play and seeing buffering, nothing played. Everything I tried same result. Says stream stopped. Back to the market to fond another.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work.
reviews.comment: Only scanner app I have ever tried that flat out will not work.
reviews.author: catherine boys

reviews.title: Poor poor App
reviews.comment: It buffers way too much haven\'t heard anything yet.It\'s been 2 hours.
reviews.author: Lakricia Hawkins

reviews.title: Carl
reviews.comment: Very good app,no problems so far and will probably update to pro.
reviews.author: A Google User
